meanings.definition: Of the same substance or essence
meanings.sent1: The twins had a consubstantial bond that made them inseparable.
meanings.sent2: The consubstantial elements of the recipe ensured its delicious taste.
meanings.sent3: The consubstantial friendship between the two dogs was evident in their synchronized tail wagging.
meanings.sent4: The consubstantial blend of colors in the painting created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent5: The consubstantial relationship between the characters made the story more compelling.
